name: invoiceplane
tagline: A self-hosted invoicing and billing application with quotes and recurring invoices
description: InvoicePlane is a classic self hosted invoicing and billing application. It lets businesses create quotes, invoices, recurring bills and track payments with a straightforward web interface and customizable templates.

features.title: Invoice and Quote Management
features.description: Creates invoices and quotes for products and services

features.title: Client Database
features.description: Stores customer records and billing details

features.title: Payment Tracking
features.description: Tracks paid and unpaid invoice statuses

features.title: PDF Generation
features.description: Generates downloadable PDF invoices and quotes

features.title: Tax Configuration
features.description: Applies configurable tax rates to invoices

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Manages billing through a browser-based UI

features.title: Self-Hosted Billing System
features.description: Runs the application on your own servers
